attributes.action: Convert on-campus exams to online exams due to a high rise of COVID cases in UK.
attributes.additional_details: Many students are scared of their exams, converting them to online exams would put students at ease.
attributes.background: Convert exams to online exams due to the rise of covid cases in the UK. or at least allow the students to choose whether they would like online exams or not.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about university teaching, assessments and exams are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you have concerns about your university's arrangements for teaching and assessment you should raise these with your university or the Office for Students, which regulates the higher education sector.
